memberdef.name: checkPotentialEnergyValidity

briefdescription.para: This routine checks if the potential energy is finite.

detaileddescription.para: Note that passing this check does not guarantee finite forces, since those use slightly different arithmetics. But in most cases there is just a narrow coordinate range where forces are not finite and energies are finite.

parameterdescription.para: The energy data; the non-bonded group energies need to be added in here before calling this routine

detaileddescription.para:
This wrapper function around put_atoms_in_box() with the ugly manual workload splitting is needed to avoid silently introducing multithreading in tools.
ePBC
The pbc type
box
The simulation box
natoms
The number of atoms
x
The coordinates of the atoms
